Whimsical Spikes

“LAC”, Museu de Sant Boi De Llobregat,Sant Boi 2013

Whimsical Spikes installation in the outdoor museum represents the constantly changing nature of the world around us. The bending spikes, seemingly pushed by the wind, symbolize the unpredictable and often chaotic forces that shape our lives. The two spikes facing in the opposite direction serve as a reminder that there are always opposing forces at work in the world. The slow and mesmerizing movement of the spikes represents the passage of time and the subtle yet significant shifts that occur as we move through life. Just as the spikes seem to bend and sway in response to the wind, we too are constantly adapting and responding to the world around us.
